referralCodeHelpPrompt:
Enter the invitation code for the person who invited you to the platform.
When you use your friend's invitation code, you and your friend will get help points.
howToWinPrompt:
You can collect help points by:
1. Send your invite link to your friends, and when they post reviews of thei products, you and your friends will get helping points.
2. When you add a review to your products, the more unique and detailed your review will be, the more points you will get.
3. When you respond to users' questions about your owned products, after the question owner accepts your response as a useful answer to him.
4. When you get admiration for your reviews or questions asked.
5. When you get a vote on your answers to the questions asked about your owned products.
6. When you log in with

aboutUsContent: The first specialized platform in the Arab world for user reviews. Our goal is to help the prospective buyers choosing their phones through the reviews provided by the platform to them, which include the experiences of users of their phones, advantages and disadvantages, as well as providing the capabilities and prices of the latest phones.
youCantAnswerAQuestionMessage: You cannot add an answer to a question about a company that you haven't reviewed one of its products
